Container.Name: Movie Poster Generator
Container.Overview: A web application for creating custom movie posters from video frames with text overlays and decorative elements. Extract frames from your media library, add text and lines, and generate 1000x1500px poster images.
Container.Description: A web application for creating custom movie posters from video frames with text overlays and decorative elements. Features include video frame selection, flexible backgrounds (image/color/gradient), frame cropping, background blur, multi-line text with alignment options, and decorative lines.

Config.Name: Output Path
Config.Description: Path where generated posters will be saved

Config.Name: Custom Fonts
Config.Description: Optional: Path to custom fonts directory (.ttf/.otf files)

Config.Name: Video Paths
Config.Description: Comma-separated list of video paths inside the container
